content.name: Gaming-Valorant
content.description: Do you think you have what it takes to play in the pro leagues? Step up to prove your worth.
rules: Only lower bracket matches are conducted on a knockout basis.
The teams are required to bring their own laptops/peripherals on the semi-finals/finals day.
Map and side selection is based on tosses. (Winner of the toss will be selecting the map and the loser can choose the side).
The matches will be conducted in standard tournament mode.
